name: KARON
description:
Created for the Godot Wild-Jam #52 "Ghosts"

Inspired by "The World's Hardest Game" by Snubby Land 

Play as Karon and cruise along the rivers of the underworld ferrying the departed across a series of levels, but do you have the skill to get through to the end?

Sound effects from:  "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" by Juhani Junkala.
